dataIdInfo.idAbs: Creates a table documenting the upload. The table is built from the OsmChange file and the upload response file. The table is used and updated by future sync tasks
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Regan Sarwas, Alaska Region GIS Team, National Park Service

tool.name: CreateUploadLog

param.name: upload
param.dialogReference: The full filename of an OSM change file. This file is typically created with the 'Creates a Places Upload File' tool. The file format is document on the OSM website. The changeset id must be "-1" - It will get replaced with the actually changeset id during the upload.
param.pythonReference: The full filename of an OSM change file. This file is typically created with the 'Creates a Places Upload File' tool. The file format is document on the OSM website. The changeset id must be "-1" - It will get replaced with the actually changeset id during the upload.

param.name: response
param.dialogReference: The full filename of a server response file from a Places upload. This file is typically created with the 'Send Upload File to Places' tool. The file format is documented on the OSM website.
param.pythonReference: The full filename of a server response file from a Places upload. This file is typically created with the 'Send Upload File to Places' tool. The file format is documented on the OSM website.

param.name: workspace
param.dialogReference: <p/>The workspace in which to create the upload log.
param.pythonReference: <p/>The workspace in which to create the upload log.

param.name: log_table
param.dialogReference: <p/>The name of the upload log. This table will document when and which features were uploaded to Places, and what thier Places id is.
param.pythonReference: <p/>The name of the upload log. This table will document when and which features were uploaded to Places, and what thier Places id is.

param.name: testing
param.dialogReference:
Which version of Places were these features sent to?

  • Unchecked - Features were created in the Official version of Places.
  • Checked - Features were created in the Test version of Places. This is the default.
param.pythonReference:
Which version of Places were these features sent to?

  • Unchecked - Features were created in the Official version of Places.
  • Checked - Features were created in the Test version of Places. This is the default.

tool.summary: Creates a table documenting the upload. The table is built from the OsmChange file and the upload response file. The table is used and updated by future sync tasks
tool.usage: Creates a table documenting the upload. The table is built from the OsmChange file and the upload response file. The table is used and updated by future sync tasks
